languages.text: "Прости меня, элантах — я позволила сумятице в душе взять верх над разумом. Подобная ошибка может стоить мне большего, чем ты в состоянии себе представить — самой моей души. Мне следует быть осмотрительнее... даже перед лицом предательства".

"Please excuse me, elantach — I allowed the turmoil in my soul to win out over my reason. A slip like that could cost me more than you can even imagine — my very soul. I must be more careful... even in the face of treachery."
languages.original_text: "Прости меня, элантах — я позволила сумятице в душе взять верх над разумом. Подобная ошибка может стоить мне большего, чем ты в состоянии себе представить — самой моей души. Мне следует быть осмотрительнее... даже перед лицом предательства".

traits.locale_text: "Please excuse me, el'antar — I allowed the turmoil in my soul to win out over my reason. A slip like that could cost me more than you can even imagine — my very soul. I must be more careful... even in the face of treachery."

"Please excuse me, el'antar — I allowed the turmoil in my soul to win out over my reason. A slip like that could cost me more than you can even imagine — my very soul. I must be more careful... even in the face of treachery."

"Please excuse me, el'antar — I allowed the turmoil in my soul to win out over my reason. A slip like that could cost me more than you can even imagine — my very soul. I must be more careful... even in the face of treachery."

"Please excuse me, elantach — I allowed the turmoil in my soul to win out over my reason. A slip like that could cost me more than you can even imagine — my very soul. I must be more careful... even in the face of treachery."

languages.text: 「すまない、エランタ…理性よりも魂の動揺が勝っていた。不注意のあまり、想像をはるかに大きいものを失うところだった。我が魂を。これまで以上の注意を払わなくてはな…裏切られようとも」
languages.original_text: "Please excuse me, elantach — I allowed the turmoil in my soul to win out over my reason. A slip like that could cost me more than you can even imagine — my very soul. I must be more careful... even in the face of treachery."

traits.locale_text: 「すまない、エランタ…理性よりも魂の動揺が勝っていた。不注意のあまり、想像をはるかに大きいものを失うところだった。我が魂を。これまで以上の注意を払わなくてはな…裏切られようとも」

languages.text: “请原谅我，外界人，是我默许灵魂的骚动战胜了我的理智。这样的失误会让我付出超乎你想象的代价——我的灵魂。我必须更加小心谨慎……即使遭到背叛，亦要如是。”
languages.original_text: "Please excuse me, elantach — I allowed the turmoil in my soul to win out over my reason. A slip like that could cost me more than you can even imagine — my very soul. I must be more careful... even in the face of treachery."

traits.locale_text: “请原谅我，外界人，是我默许灵魂的骚动战胜了我的理智。这样的失误会让我付出超乎你想象的代价——我的灵魂。我必须更加小心谨慎……即使遭到背叛，亦要如是。”

languages.text: «Perdóname, elantach; he permitido que el desasosiego de mi alma se impusiera a mi razón. Un desliz así podría costarme más de lo que puedas imaginar: mi propia alma. Debo tener más cuidado... incluso en la faz de la traición».
languages.original_text: "Please excuse me, elantach — I allowed the turmoil in my soul to win out over my reason. A slip like that could cost me more than you can even imagine — my very soul. I must be more careful... even in the face of treachery."

traits.locale_text: «Perdóname, elantach; he permitido que el desasosiego de mi alma se impusiera a mi razón. Un desliz así podría costarme más de lo que puedas imaginar: mi propia alma. Debo tener más cuidado... incluso en la faz de la traición».

languages.text: "Bitte verzeiht, Elantach – ich habe dem Tumult in meiner Seele gestattet, meine Vernunft zu besiegen. Ein Ausrutscher wie dieser könnte mich mehr kosten, als Ihr Euch vorstellen könnt – meine Seele nämlich. Ich muss vorsichtiger sein ... selbst angesichts von Verrat."
languages.original_text: "Please excuse me, elantach — I allowed the turmoil in my soul to win out over my reason. A slip like that could cost me more than you can even imagine — my very soul. I must be more careful... even in the face of treachery."

traits.locale_text: "Bitte verzeiht, Elantach – ich habe dem Tumult in meiner Seele gestattet, meine Vernunft zu besiegen. Ein Ausrutscher wie dieser könnte mich mehr kosten, als Ihr Euch vorstellen könnt – meine Seele nämlich. Ich muss vorsichtiger sein ... selbst angesichts von Verrat."

languages.text: « Je vous présente mes excuses, elantach ; j'ai laissé mes affres intérieures l'emporter sur ma raison. Ce genre d'erreur pourrait me coûter bien plus que vous ne pouvez l'imaginer... jusqu'à mon âme. Je dois faire preuve d'une plus grande prudence, même face à la trahison. »
languages.original_text: "Please excuse me, elantach — I allowed the turmoil in my soul to win out over my reason. A slip like that could cost me more than you can even imagine — my very soul. I must be more careful... even in the face of treachery."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous présente mes excuses, elantach ; j'ai laissé mes affres intérieures l'emporter sur ma raison. Ce genre d'erreur pourrait me coûter bien plus que vous ne pouvez l'imaginer... jusqu'à mon âme. Je dois faire preuve d'une plus grande prudence, même face à la trahison. »

languages.text: "Bağışla elantach. Ruhumdaki çalkantıların mantığımı bastırmasına izin verdim. Böyle bir hata, bana hayal edebileceğinden çok daha fazlasına, bizatihi ruhuma mal olabilir. İhanete uğrasam dahi... Soğukkanlılığımı korumalıyım."
languages.original_text: "Please excuse me, elantach — I allowed the turmoil in my soul to win out over my reason. A slip like that could cost me more than you can even imagine — my very soul. I must be more careful... even in the face of treachery."

traits.locale_text: "Bağışla elantach. Ruhumdaki çalkantıların mantığımı bastırmasına izin verdim. Böyle bir hata, bana hayal edebileceğinden çok daha fazlasına, bizatihi ruhuma mal olabilir. İhanete uğrasam dahi... Soğukkanlılığımı korumalıyım."
